Package Controller

Class MenuController

java.lang.Object
Controller.MenuController
public class MenuController extends Object
Controller class handling the restaurant's menu.

  • Method Details

    • viewMenu

      public void viewMenu()
      Display's the restaurant's menu.

    • createMenuItem

      public void createMenuItem​(int itemID, String name, String desc, double price, MenuItemType type)
      Creates a menu item based on the given input.
      Parameters:
      itemID - the item's serial number
      name - the item's name
      desc - the item's description
      price - the item's price
      type - the item's type

    • removeMenuItem

      public int removeMenuItem​(int id)
      Removes a menu item from the menu at the given serial number.
      Parameters:
      id - the serial number of the menu item to be removed
      Returns:
      1 if successfully removed, -1 if item not found

    • updateMenuItem

      public int updateMenuItem​(int id, String name)
      Updates the name of a menu item with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the menu item
      name - the new name of the menu item
      Returns:
      1 if successfully updated, -1 if item not found

    • updateMenuItemDesc

      public int updateMenuItemDesc​(int id, String desc)
      Updates the description of a menu item with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the menu item
      desc - the new description of the menu item
      Returns:
      1 if successfully updated, -1 if item not found

    • updateMenuItem

      public int updateMenuItem​(int id, double price)
      Updates the price of a menu item with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the menu item
      price - the new price of the menu item
      Returns:
      1 if successfully updated, -1 if item not found

    • updateMenuItem

      public int updateMenuItem​(int id, MenuItemType type)
      Updates the type of a menu item with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the menu item
      type - the new type of the menu item
      Returns:
      1 if successfully updated, -1 if item not found

    • viewMenuItem

      public int viewMenuItem​(int id)
      Displays the menu item with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the menu item, 0 if all
      Returns:
      1 if successfully displayed, -1 if item not found

    • createPromotionSet

      public void createPromotionSet​(int promoID, String name, ArrayList<Integer> indices, String desc, double price)
      Creates a new promotion set based on the given input.
      Parameters:
      promoID - the ID of the set
      name - the name of the set
      indices - the IDs of the items in the set
      desc - the description of the set
      price - the price of the set

    • removePromotionSet

      public int removePromotionSet​(int id)
      Removes a promotion set with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the promotion set to be removed
      Returns:
      1 if successfully removed, -1 if set not found

    • addItemPromotionSet

      public int addItemPromotionSet​(int id, int idItem)
      Adds a menu item to a promotion set with a given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the promotion set
      idItem - the ID of the menu item to be added
      Returns:
      1 if successfully added, -1 if set not found

    • removeItemPromotionSet

      public int removeItemPromotionSet​(int idPromo, int idItem)
      Removes an item with the given ID from a promo set with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      idPromo - the ID of the promo set
      idItem - the ID of the item
      Returns:
      1 if successful, -1 if either item or promo set not found

    • updatePromotionSet

      public int updatePromotionSet​(int id, String name, String desc, double price)
      Updates the promotion set's details.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the set
      name - the new name of the set
      desc - the new description of the set
      price - the new price of the set
      Returns:
      1 if change is successful, -1 if set not found

    • viewPromotionSet

      public int viewPromotionSet​(int id)
      Displays the promotion set with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the promotion set, 0 if all
      Returns:
      1 if successfully displayed, -1 if set not found
